author: cskiraly
content:
I've started to draft a document on mempool blob scaling, with a first part on making sure we know what capacity we can support for Fusaka and following BPOs, and a second part on mempool sharding and related ideas.

Work is already in progress on both aspects in many groups, but I think we could use a dedicated channel to discuss and coordinate the mempool specific aspects. What do you think? What are your preferences?

It would also be great to have a list of the people working on the mempool from different EL teams. From Geth side I'm currently on it.

https://notes.ethereum.org/@cskiraly/mempool-scaling-blobs

The doc is very preliminary (I'm just back from holidays), but I plan to extend it in the next few days.
